name: 悪島
message: "HA HA HA HA HA HA! If you wanna die that bad, I'm happy to oblige! Kill! Kill! Kill 'em all!"
With a triumphant howl, Akushima sets his officers on us.
...But for some reason, several cops turn around and point their guns at him.

name: 悪島
message: "Huh?! What the fuck do you think you're doing?!"

name: 悪島
message: "WHOAAAAA??!!"
A cop's gun barks and the megaphone falls from Akushima's hands.

name: 悪島
message: "Have you gone INSANE?!"

name: ミンク
message: "You have no one to blame but yourself."
The color drains from Akushima's face.

name: 悪島
message: "...You didn't. Scum like you? You couldn't..."

name: ミンク
message: "Couldn't what?"

name: 悪島
message: "What the fuck did you dooooo?!"

name: ミンク
message: "All I did was offer your men better pay than your bosses do."

name: 悪島
message: "MOTHERFUCKEEEERRRRR!!!!"
As if to silence Akushima, Mink pulls something from the bag of weapons and tosses it down at his feet.
White smoke fills the room with a bang.

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "Fuck yeah!"

name: ミンクチームＢ
message: "How'd ya like that?!"
It's started! Gunshots and angry roars lance back and forth across the smoke-filled room.
I skitter off to hide behind one of the wooden crates.
A near miss freezes the blood in my veins.
My legs almost give out from the shock, but I find the edge of one of the boxes and get behind it somehow.
I hunch down, sticking close to the side of the box.

If that bullet had hit me...
The thought paralyzes me with fear.
Mink told me to protect myself... but what the hell does he expect me to do?
I'm not like him and his guys. Sure, I've been in brawls before, but I've never been in a gunfight.
Is he asking me to kill? To kill people with this gun?
Kill or be killed. That's what it means to protect yourself.
But...
Easier said than done!
Someone bumps into me from out of the smoke.
I try to escape, but he grabs my arm.

name: ミンク
message: "Wait."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Mink...!"
It's Mink, holding a submachine gun.

name: ミンク
message: "You plan to hide the whole fight? You've got a gun, don't you?"

name: ミンク
message: "Don't know how? Or do you just not want to?"
